body_html:
That is a CUDA library, anaconda2 should not, and would not have that library.
Also, one of your error messages complain about cuda 9.0, and the 2nd complain about cuda 8.0
you will need to pick which version of TF you want to work with, then install the corresponding CUDA version.

body:
That is a CUDA library, anaconda2 should not, and would not have that library.
Also, one of your error messages complain about  cuda 9.0, and the 2nd complain about cuda 8.0
you will need to pick which version of TF you want to work with, then install the corresponding CUDA version.
